title: Spurs & Stilettos
description: **Mature Content Warning** Recommended for ages 17+ due to language and sexual content.Who knew two separate events would turn Hope Trahan’s life completely upside down?After losing her sister in a tragic car accident and finding her fiancé cheating on her, Hope thought she’d never be the same again. That was, until her best friend drug her down to the rodeo to help clear her head.It was there where she met Wesley. A sexy, sweet talking cowboy. For the first time in months Hope felt a glimmer hope at the end of a very long, dark, tunnel…Wesley Tyler was a bronc rider who owned two national titles and was riding his way to the next.The day he met Hope, he knew he wanted her in his life. However, he soon discovers that Hope carries ghosts with her she can’t quite shake, and her past seems to have a death grip on her.Does Wesley hold the key to helping her overcome it all? Can he win her over?Or will her past continue to haunt her…Forever…
author: Ashley  Johnson
